text: Romedi Spada (born 8 March 1925) was a Swiss alpine skier. He competed in the men's downhill at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Swiss male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Switzerland Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:People from Graubünden
title: Romedi Spada
